DeleteHistoryData: Are you sure you want to delete this line? This can not be undone.
Error404Text: The page you are looking for does not exist (anymore) or has been moved.
ErrorInactivity: You are logged out due to prolonged inactivity
ErrorOAuthFailed: The combination of the email address and password entered by you is invalid. Try again.
ErrorServerFailure: An error has occurred. The server seems unreachable. Try again later.
ErrorUnauthorizedCall: This action is not (yet) allowed for you.
ForgotPasswordText: Enter the email address that you used to register with Grip and we will send you an email to reset your password.
NewPasswordText: Think of a new password for your Grip account consisting of at least 8 characters.
PasswordResetText: You can now log in with your new password!
ResetYourPasswordText: We have sent an email to {{username}} with instructions to set a new password
TermsOfUse: By logging in you agree to the terms of use.
TooLongFileName: The file name is too long
UnsavedChangesAlert: When you go to this page, any information you entered will be lost. Are you sure you want to continue?
UnsupportedAlertText: Grip is designed to work well on tablets and regular computers. On smaller devices, such as smartphones, some parts will not work properly.
